page.title: 09WEEKEND ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: WEEKEND ENTERTAINMENT VARIES CONSIDERABLY FROM CHILDREN TO CHILDREN.SOME PREFER TO SPEND A LOT OF THEIR TIME IN BED BUT MOST PREFER TO GO OUT TO PLAY WITH THEIR FRIENDS OR RELATIVES.SOME CHILDREN GO TO THE SWIMMING POOL OR TO THE PARK TO PLAY FOOTBALL OR OTHER SORTS OF GAMES. A FEW MIGHT EVEN GO OUT INTO THE COUNTRY TO GO HORSE RIDING OR JUST WALKING. ON SUNDAYS MOST PEOPLE DO OUTDOOR THINGS BECAUSE THE INDOOR AMUSEMENTS ARE NOT OPEN.SUNDAY SHOULD BE A QUIETER DAY,PERHAPS, BUT GENERALLY IT IS VERY NOISY.YOUNGER CHILDREN RUN AROUND PLAYING COWBOYS AND INDIANS OR HIDE AND SEEK. OTHERS JUST RIDE THEIR BIKES ON THE PAVEMENTS. SOME CHILDREN DO HELP THEIR PARENTS ON A SUNDAY IN THE HOUSE OR GARDEN.
